body_html:
Currently, I am using following code:

for x in tf.global_variables():
    if not sess.run(tf.is_variable_initialized(x)):
        sess.run(x.initializer)

but I found it extremely slow!

Can you consider maintain a flag to indicate whether a variable is initialized?
body:
Currently, I am using following code:

```
for x in tf.global_variables():
    if not sess.run(tf.is_variable_initialized(x)):
        sess.run(x.initializer)
```

but I found it extremely slow!

Can you consider maintain a flag to indicate whether a variable is initialized?
